ðŸ“– Summary: Anx Reader is an e-book reader that enhances the reading experience with AI capabilities, cross-platform support, and synchronization. It supports various e-book formats and offers features like AI assistance, data visualization, customizable styles, and note-taking, making reading smarter and more focused.
